title: Ground News - All my writings are love letters to people, says Bengali writer Sirshendu Mukhopadhyay
text:
Summary by Ground News Sirshendu Mukhopadhyay was honoured with Kuvempu Rashtriya Puraskara at Kuppali on Friday. He is the 11th recipient and the first Bengali writer to receive the award. The award was presented at a function organised by the Rashtrakavi KuveMPu Trust. Share menu More
